ccs.graph

Class LinkageGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccs.graph.AbstractGraph<Vertex>
      • ccs.graph.LinkageGraph

  • public class LinkageGraph
extends AbstractGraph<Vertex>
    The combinatorics of a graph underlying a linkage. Implemented using adjacent-list.
    Author:
    Menghan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LinkageGraph() 
      LinkageGraph(LinkageGraph g)
      Constructs a copy of the given graph.
